text: 11.55 Part 2 sets out that developments which seek CIL-in-kind will need to be supported by information which justifies and sets out what the CILin-kind comprises and how this equates to the strategic infrastructure development contribution. Part 2 emphasises the importance of early discussions with the council in instances where developers are seeking CIL-in-kind. In some instances, the delivery of strategic infrastructure as part of a development proposal may make the development eligible for CIL-in-kind, but this will be at the discretion of the council, following discussions with the Infrastructure Planning team.
